title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2050.6 - Subject matter list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2050.6 - Subject matter list

State Regulations
(a) A
reasonably detailed current list, by subject matter, of all records in the
possession of the corporation, whether or not the records are available
pursuant to the Public Officers Law, shall be maintained and shall be available
for public inspection. The list shall be sufficiently detailed to permit the
requester to identify the file category of the record sought. (b) The subject matter list shall be updated
periodically, not less than twice per year. The date of the most recent
updating shall appear on the first page of the list. (c) Access to specific records in the various
categories contained in the subject matter list shall be governed by the Public

Officers Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2050.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
